spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent overall room placement and adjacency. Wall alignment is consistent with the blueprinted floor plan. Minor door swing orientation errors and window depths.

structural_fidelity.notes: Full compliance. Roof is removed, all rooms are present, and the background is a clean neutral dark gray with no text or measurement overlays.

furniture_mapping.notes: Clean block-style furniture matches the layout precisely. Kitchen counters, beds, and living room sofas are correctly scaled and positioned.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High adherence to style. Flat shading, low-poly geometry, and a perfect isometric orthographic camera angle used.

detected_errors.description: The balcony door/closet door swing direction in the top left corner is inverted compared to the blueprint.
Slight distortion in the window depth of the main living room area compared to the thin glass line in the floor plan.
